signup_sub_header: You are new here, tell us about you.

empty_book_store_heading: You currently have no book in your store shelf
no_notification_msg: You currently have no new notification, check back later.
no_collaborators_heading: Collaborators are {{value}}'s mobile app users that sell your book on your behalf for a commission you assign to them. This is particularly useful in the case of academic institutions selling your book to it's student on your behalf.
no_collaborators_sub_heading: Collaborators earn assigned commision whenever a user buy your book by clicking on the link to your book that the collaborator shared to user from the book store, or your book page on the collaborator's device. This is particularly useful in the case of academic institutions selling your book to it's student on your behalf
profile_update_failed_msg: Oops, unable to update your profile, check your internet connection and try again
id_confid_msg: Do not share your publisher's ID with anyone
all_dev_logout_failed_msg: Unable to logout all devices that are signed in to this account, check your internet connection and try again
logout_all_dev_recom_msg: We recommend that you should only logout all devices from your account if you believe someone else have or could have access to your account on another device you have previously signed in to.
server_error_msg: Unable to load the requested resource as a result of an internal server error. Wait a few minute and try again.
no_payment_details_heading: {{username}} add your payment details so that we can send you payment for your books that are sold on {{value}}.

enter_valid_isbn: Enter a valid ISBN or leave field empty if your book does not have ISBN

book_uploading_msg: Uploading book, do not leave this page untill book upload completes.
